expected_findings.description: Unsafe undefined behavior: get_raw_ptr returns raw pointer to a local String that is dropped, resulting in a dangling pointer
Panic on missing key: unwrap() on Option from user-controlled key lookup will panic at runtime
Unnecessary allocation: get_or_default returns String via .to_string() instead of borrowing with &str

metadata.description: Rust config parser with dangling pointer, panic on unwrap, and unnecessary allocation
